subject: Management
title: The Vision Story
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Vision Story.

hook.text: A CEO's change memo was 40 pages. Nobody read it. His successor told a 3-minute story. Everyone remembered.

buildup.text: A clear, compelling vision is the foundation of change communication. Without it, people drift.

discovery.text: Kotter: if you can't describe the vision in five minutes and get a reaction, it's not clear enough.

twist.text: Data motivates the head. Stories motivate the heart. Change needs both, but the heart moves first.

climax.text: Craft a simple story: where we are, why we must move, where we're going, and what it looks like there.

punchline.text: If they can't retell your vision, you haven't communicated it.

quiz.question: What makes a change vision effective?
options: It can be described in five minutes and inspires an emotional reaction
It includes as much data and detail as possible
It only needs to be communicated once at the start
